title: The Return of MIDNIGHT’S WAR
author: VD
content_html:
We’re just wrapping up Issues #5 and #6 of Midnight’s War, and a new episode is available on Arktoons. More will be coming soon. I’ve also had requests to keep posting the daily links here, so we’ll see what we can do about that.

MIDNIGHT’S WAR Episode 37: What Have You Done?

THE AWAKENER Episode 43: Planetary Rule

CHUCK DIXON’S AVALON Episode 59: My Day in Court

SPACEKRAKEN Episode 4: Jurassic Science

STONETOSS Episode 95: Killing Time

ALT★HERO Episode 60: Entering the Catacombs

CHESTER AND FRIENDS Episode 6: My Flower

SOMETHING BIG Episode 48: Out of Luck

THE STRANDED Episode 26: Meeting the In-Laws

BOB Episode 41: Hi!

DISCUSS ON SG
